comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Welcome YoCa.sh to Bitcointalk.Your team made a right decision to join Bitcointalk that is a biggest forum for Bitcoin community and for cryptocurrency gambling industry too. Many casinos have their announcement threads here, from very old casinos to new ones like YoCa.sh.As a representative of Yoca.sh brand, the representative who handle the OP account must master forum rules.Whenever you have time, you must read the following thread to understand more about forum rules.Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQBuying a Copper membership is good, first your team support the forum and second with this, your account will be able to post and display images for your announcement graphics.In case your team want to advertise your casino with like a signature campaign or more marketing type, you can ping me through PM for more details. Glad if I can help your team with it.I saw your team have bug bounty, buy back and burn program, looks good to build up your platform, secure it and show your team commitment to build the token.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk forum.A brief question about this.. No kyc does this shows that your project can handle a big payout without requesting for personal documents or even makes it too difficult user to make withdraw. Most of the casino/gambling site nowadays always portrays of not request for kyc details but when there is a huge winning in the system they often cooked up stories to stands in their in favor whereby referencing to one of ToS in other not to release payment to the winner.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Welcome to the forum. It's good to see another Web 3 casino here in the forum. Just check through the casino, and the background is simple and attractive. You have fewer games, which I believe is just a result of your type of casino, as games that could only be compatible with the network are what you provide, so we, the sport betting lovers, might really not have a place in your casino. Any way, it's good to have you here. I hope to see you more often, and you can also start some promotions in order to get exposure in the forum.Quote from: Adbitco on November 21, 2023, 06:45:42 AMThank you for the feedback, I clicked on the image and took me to connect wallet as decentralized gambling platform how are you sure gamblers or bettor's wallet are safe with your project (site). Is there any term that binds you and your bettors if any hack and lost at the cost of trying to connect one's wallet to gamble on your site, we know it's very hard for one to connect their wallet to site without any trust rated by reputable user here to confirm the originality of your platform. Security should be your number priority..Even if we are given some guarantee in respect to customer funds and wallet protection, it's still not safe to connect one's main wallet with multiple holdings on different networks into a casino dapp. I always advise anyone playing in a casino that requires wallet connectivity to create a total new wallet for that which they can fund just for that purpose, and if anything goes wrong, they won't have to lose much. It also reduces wallet exposure to third-party sites.

My wallet is not connected because I don't use my coins to gamble, however I like sport games but it seems like the sport games are not yet on the YoCa.sh casino.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: There are more and more decentralized casino sites and this is good for gamblers who don't like casinos that ask for KYC, I know that there are a lot of debates on KYC issues in this forum sometimes some of them don't feel comfortable with the KYC system at casinos that's why I want to see how they welcome this decentralized site with no KYC, I hope you continue to maintain this casino.Several decentralized sites that have come before have been promoted here but unfortunately these decentralized sites never last long and always end up going bankrupt, therefore I hope you will continue to maintain your site and don't forget to get traffic from this forum. You can hold a signature campaign if needed in this forum, btw welcome to the forum and I just visited your site everything looks good

comments.author: davis196
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.I've been waiting for a fully functional decentralized casino for so long.I can't wait to play rock-paper-scissors in player-vs-player move.  When will PVP mode become a reality?I don't trust this "connect your wallet" feature. Many people have been scammed by connecting their wallet to an unknown third party.Also I didn't find any info about the "Investors getting dividends" program. How big dividends do you plan to offer?Are the dividends guaranteed and how the investors can protect their rights, if there's no dividend? Do you plan the "investment/dividend" system to be also based on smart contracts and located on the blockchain?Anyway, good luck with this project, OP!

comments.author: 7lucky7number7
comments.body: Quote from: piebeyb on November 21, 2023, 07:59:22 AMThere are more and more decentralized casino sites and this is good for gamblers who don't like casinos that ask for KYC, I know that there are a lot of debates on KYC issues in this forum sometimes some of them don't feel comfortable with the KYC system at casinos that's why I want to see how they welcome this decentralized site with no KYC, I hope you continue to maintain this casino.Several decentralized sites that have come before have been promoted here but unfortunately these decentralized sites never last long and always end up going bankrupt, therefore I hope you will continue to maintain your site and don't forget to get traffic from this forum. You can hold a signature campaign if needed in this forum, btw welcome to the forum and I just visited your site everything looks good  First id like to say thanks for replying to our post were glad to see were being received so well.A lot of sites may be decentralized but im not aware of any others that solved for the latency of 100% on chain gameplay the way we did here at YoCash. That’s why when playing on the YoCash platform you can always rest assured your gameplay was a 100% fair result with no way for anyone to tamper with the results because it all took place on chain.As for the bankrupt question i dont see it in the cards, this is a decentralized platform/project with very little overhead. Even if the company behind the platform disintegrated everything would work just as it does now. If for some crazy stroke of luck a user/users hit the max payout on a large bet over and over again enough to drain all the casinos funds then sure but the probability for that could be worked out to represent about a 0% chance.

comments.author: 7lucky7number7
comments.body: Quote from: kotajikikox on November 21, 2023, 06:43:56 AMWelcome to our humble but popular forum Bitcointalk guys , first your Domain is easy to remember and yes your site looks fresh but eye friendly so that is already a good point .But those promises looks good also because a complete Decentralized is what crypto gamblers are looking , but i will watch this casino first before considering to deposit and play , because those No KYC and Instant Payouts seems so promising that I first need to hear from other players before deciding to play.Thanks for replying to our post! We look forward to you giving the platform a test drive and giving us some honest feedback.I did notice you mentioned deposits. With YoCash you never deposit funds. The YoCash platforms functions much like uniswap or other DEX where you connect your wallet, approve a spending limit, but then instead of swapping tokens you play verifiably fair on chain games of chance with the winnings of each bet in your wallet as you win them.
